Remark: Recommended a dividend of Rs. 4/- per Ordinary share (200%) and Rs. 4.10 per 'A' Ordinary share (205%), both of face value of Rs. 2/- each (post split) for FY 2011-12.
To consider the proposal for raising of additional long term resources upto US $ 500 million.
To voluntary delist the equity shares of the company excluding BSE and NSE
EGM of the company will be held, to consider the proposal on financial restructuring and reduction of share capital.
